basic_information.scholarship_name: CW & Alfa Sasser Endowed ACM Scholarship-NOMINATION

description: This scholarship was established in 2010 by emeritus faculty member and gifted economist Dr. Sue Lynn Sasser in memory of her late parents, C.W. and Alfa Sasser. Inspired by Sue Lynn's parents' love of music and devotion to ministry, this scholarship is awarded by faculty nomination to an ACM@ UCO student with particular interest in religious, gospel, praise or worship music. Eligibility Student enrolled at ACM@UCO Interest in religious, gospel, praise or worship music Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
